title: Silent error suppression in wong-helpers.sh and Sync() update-stale
description:
Multiple places silently swallow errors:

wong-helpers.sh:
- All 'jj workspace update-stale' calls end with '2>/dev/null || true' (lines 59, 130, 35)
- _wong_sync error path only checks grep output, doesn't propagate jj failures

wongdb.go:
- update-stale in runJJ() is 'best-effort' with error ignored (line 92)
- update-stale in Sync() ignores return value (lines 298, 322)
- update-stale in EnsureMergeParent() ignores return value (line 475)

If update-stale fails (repo corruption, disk full, jj bug), every subsequent operation uses stale data and fails in confusing ways with no connection to the root cause.

Fix: Log update-stale failures even if we continue. In the Go code, at minimum log.Printf the error. In shell, redirect stderr to a log file rather than /dev/null.

Files: wong_impl/wong-helpers.sh lines 35, 59, 130; wong_impl/internal/wongdb/wongdb.go lines 92, 298, 322, 475
